content.raw:
This looks like it's almost ready to merge in. A couple of minor things to improve:

1. The time should be in seconds \(for consistency\), with the same precision as labscript can handle \(1ns resolution\)
2. The value should also probably have more significant figures in the decimal...not sure what is a good number though since it depends on the device capabilities. Maybe setting it to 9 significant figures after the decimal point as well is the best solution for now? \(overkill, but at least it would match the time\)
3. We should have a button/checkbox next to the "reset x/y axis" buttons that turns the tooltip on/off.
